@harrodsman @harrodsbeauty @harrodsfood @harrodsestates

node.text:
She handles fabrics and he works with clay, but combined, @AdrianaMeunie_Textilework and @JaumeRoig_Ceramics bring a little piece of Balearic culture to London.

Experience their creations in our #LoewePaulas pop-up on the First Floor, as part of an audio-visual programme of events.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

node.text:
Inspired by the nature that surrounds her idyllic Ibizan studio, artisan Laura de Grinyo of #LadioCeramics is faithful to the island’s pottery tradition – capturing its energy and beauty in a collection designed exclusively for @Loewe Paula’s Ibiza at Harrods.

Find Laura’s work in the #LoewePaulas Ibiza pop-up in International Designer on the First Floor until the end of August. 

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

node.text:
Our little slice of the Balearics in Knightsbridge, the Loewe Paula’s Ibiza pop-up is the ultimate refuge from holiday blues. 

Discover the space with head of womenswear @MariaMilano as she reveals her top picks from the collection. 

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #LoewePaulas

node.title: Walk the Loewe Paula’s Ibiza Pop-Up

node.text:
We’re bringing some musical energy into your Monday, care of a @loewe DJ session with @beachmessiah.

You can experience this and the likes of vibrational sound healing and meditation in our #LoewePaulas pop-up on the First Floor, where an immersive Experiential Room complete with 360° visuals and surround sound is waiting to transport you to warmer climes.

Dancer: @marta_chandra 
Producer: @delicalisten 

#Harrods #Loewe

#Harrods

node.text:
While life, for many of us, was put on pause for the past year, time never stands still in the world of haute horlogerie. Join Beth Hannaway – Harrods head of fine watches and fine jewellery – and contributing watches editor Robin Swithinbank as they round up the top trends from @WatchesandWonders 2021. 

#Harrods #HarrodsFineWatches #WatchesandWonders2021

node.text:
What @Balmain creative director #OlivierRousteing doesn’t know about fashion isn’t worth knowing. The man behind the wardrobes of the world’s most influential women – from @Beyonce to #BrigitteMacron, Olivier dialled in from #Balmain HQ to catch up with fashion director @LydsKing.
 
#Harrods #HarrodsFashion
 
Our stores are closed but you can still discover the #WorldOfHarrods through Personal Shopping and online at harrods.com.

node.text:
Gala González has an eye for the next big thing. Join fashion director @LydsKing as she dials in the Spanish style maven and @Amlul founder ahead of the launch of her latest project – a collaboration with @PedroGarciaShoes – exclusively at Harrods.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #PedroXAmlul #GalaGonzalez 

Our stores are closed but you can still discover the #WorldOfHarrods through Personal Shopping and online at harrods.com.

node.text:
Simone Rocha’s shows are always a #LondonFashionWeek highlight and – despite being digital-only – she didn’t disappoint for AW21. Fashion director @LydsKing caught up with the designer just one week before the collection was unveiled to find out more.
 
#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #SimoneRocha
 
Our stores are closed but you can still discover the #WorldOfHarrods through Personal Shopping and online at harrods.com.

With digital #LondonFashionWeek upon us – and all eyes on the capital’s hottest design talent, @LydsKing dials in #Rixo founders Henrietta Rix and Orlagh McCloskey to discover what’s inspiring the duo for the upcoming season.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

Our stores are closed but you can still discover the #WorldOfHarrods through Personal Shopping and online at harrods.com.

node.text:
In lieu of IRL Fashion Week catch-ups, we’re again counting on all things virtual – digital presentations, tech innovations and, of course, video calls. Join fashion director @LydsKing as she talks style and inspiration with #RotateBirgerChristensen creative directors @_JeanetteMadsen_ and @Thora_Valdimars.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

Our stores are closed but you can still discover the #WorldOfHarrods through Personal Shopping and online at harrods.com.

node.text:
While the rest of the world was baking banana bread… Set and filmed in #Harrods, Locked Down is a tale of resilience with a healthy dose of humour and stars none other than @AnneHathaway and #ChiwetelEjiofor. When the world is locked down, they’ll find their ticket out.

#LockedDownFilm is available to stream in the US on Thursday 14th January via @hbomax. 
Coming soon to the UK and the rest of the world.

Our stores are closed – but you can still shop remotely through our Personal Shopping service, and online at harrods.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Harrods on July 25, 2021 tagging @co. May be an image of 1 person, standing, outdoors and brick wall.

node.text:
You can’t spell cosy without @Co. There’s no time like the present to plan ahead for the cooler months – and the Los Angeles brand is the first and last word in luxury layering.

Find #Co in Advanced International on the First Floor.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

node.text:
Organic cotton, silk and recycled polyester are just three of the responsibly sourced fabrics you can expect from @ToveStudio – new to Harrods this season. Pared-back creations are designed for longevity, and are the effortless heatwave staples we’ve been longing for.

Find #Tove in Advanced International on the First Floor. 

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #NewtoHarrods

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods on July 22, 2021. May be an image of table and indoor.

node.text:
Home is where the art is. Proportion, colour and form are key considerations when selecting artworks to complement your living space. Our team of visual experts – comprised of stylists, interior designers and architects – are on hand to help you find pieces that will bring your every room to life. 

Find Harrods Interior Design on the Third Floor, and visit our link in bio to find out more. 

#Harrods #HarrodsInteriors

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods in Harrods. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Get ready for the next Roaring Twenties with an ode to the last – @VacheronConstantin’s Historique American 1921 has been revisited for a new era in its centenary year. Distinguished by an off-kilter crown placed between one and two o’clock, the watch has an unusual diagonal angle which means you need barely turn the wrist to check if it’s cocktail hour. 

Find #VacheronConstantin in Fine Watches on the Ground Floor.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods in Harrods with @yuzefi. May be an image of 1 person, standing and outdoors.

node.text:
Your favourite arm candy makes its ready-to-wear debut. @Yuzefi bags are already a favourite for their architectural silhouettes, and now that same energy translates into a covetable wardrobe that’s timeless yet directional all at once.

Find #Yuzefi in Contemporary & Denim on the Fourth Floor.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #NewtoHarrods

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods in Harrods with @tiffanyandco. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
It may be called Jewel Box, but @TiffanyandCo’s new collection isn’t one to be stowed away. Show your true, elegant colours with each dazzling gemstone. 

Find #TiffanyandCo in Fine Jewellery on the Ground Floor.

#Harrods #HarrodsFineJewellery

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods in Harrods with @machandmach. May be an image of sandals.

node.text:
Out-out heels at the ready. 💕 What will you be wearing for your first twirl on the dancefloor?

Find @MachandMach in Shoe Heaven on the Fifth Floor.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion #MachandMach

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harrods in Harrods with @gucci. May be an image of 1 person, standing, purse and outdoors.

node.text:
Over 25 years since @Gucci's cult-favourite accessory first caught the eye of Lady Diana, Alessandro Michele has reimagined the bamboo handle tote with the playful addition of neon straps – a knowing nod to the bands used to preserve the shape of the original.

Find #Gucci in Luxury Accessories on the Ground Floor.

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Harrods on July 17, 2021 tagging @azfactory. May be an image of one or more people.

node.text:
With love from Alber Elbaz. Characterised by the same joyful energy that pervaded the legendary designer’s career, @AZFactory’s eco-sustainable take on wardrobe essentials is as purposeful as it is playful.

Find #AZFactory in Womenswear on the First Floor.

Plus, enjoy 10% off with Harrods Rewards this weekend. Join online or in-store for free today!

#Harrods #HarrodsFashion
